summary: This module implements a process-based launcher that spawns a separate operating system process to execute a benchmark according to a supplied configuration. It sets up inter‑process communication, configures logging, captures any exceptions, and assembles the results into a benchmark report while ensuring proper cleanup of resources.
business_intent: Provide a robust mechanism for running benchmark workloads in isolated processes, enabling parallel execution, resource isolation, and reliable collection of performance data for downstream analysis.
